thread.title: Ross Aboff joins SBG Technology Solutions as Vice President of Health Solutions

author: cnbc.com
title: Ross Aboff joins SBG Technology Solutions as Vice President of Health Solutions

organizations.name: electronic heath records modernization and cyber security program
united states army communications electronics command

text:
ALEXANDRIA, Va., Feb. 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- SBG Technology Solutions, an industry leader and one of the fastest growing engineering and information technology service providers in the United States, recently announced that Ross Aboff will head its Health Solutions Division. Reporting to CEO Carlos Del Toro, Ross will support SBG's Healthcare clientele and work to expand SBG's Healthcare business portfolio. In particular, he will focus on SBG's SDVOSB Prime Contractor role on the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) T4NG contract. SBG has been a reliable partner to VA since 2009, supporting more than 20 projects, including high-profile transformational initiatives such as Electronic Heath Records Modernization and Cyber Security Program and Policy support.
Ross brings with him to SBG a distinguished career and diverse background. He started his career as a Project Engineer at the United States Army Communications Electronics Command (CECOM), where he was an Acquisition Professional and one of the founders of the Rapid Response (R2) acquisition program. Thereafter, Ross worked as an attorney for some of New Jersey's most prestigious law firms. In 2009, he returned to the federal contracting industry, where he has since supported both large and small businesses that have experienced significant success on the T4 and T4NG vehicles. Some of the projects Ross has supported include VistA Evolution 1.0; Enterprise Shared Services PMO; Financial Service Center Development; Agile Transformation; VistA Surgery; and VistA Security Remediation.
Ross holds BSEE and MBA degrees from Rutgers University, and a JD from Seton Hall University. "We are thrilled to welcome Ross to the SBG Team," said Carlos Del Toro, CEO of SBG. "I am confident that his track record of success will help us achieve our goal of expanding the SBG footprint in the Federal healthcare market."
About SBG Technology Solutions: SBG Technology Solutions, Inc. is a nationwide provider of IT solutions; program management services; enterprise engineering; cyber security services, software development, intelligence services, call center technology and services; and training to federal and commercial clients. A representative sample of our clients include the: Department of Veterans Affairs; Health and Human Services Agency, Defense Health Agency; U.S. Navy; Army National Guard, Defense Intelligence Agency, Defense Threat Reduction Agency, and the Transportation Security Administration. Additional information about SBG Technology Solutions can be found at, http://sbgts.com/ .
